name: Allinpay INTL
author: aipsg

sections.description:
Description:
Allinpay INTL is a WooCommerce payment gateway plugin that allows your customers to make domestic and international payments with Allinpay. All major cards and ewallets are accepted.

Features:
– Accept domestic and international payments through Allinpay.
– Secured and reliable payment processing.
– Easy integration with your WooCommerce store.

Installation:
– Login to your WordPress Account.
– On Left Menu, select ‘Plugins’.
– Search for “Allinpay INTL” in the search bar.
– To download, Click on Allinpay INTL in the results below.

OR

  • Upload the ‘allinpay-intl’ folder to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory.
  • Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  • Go to WooCommerce > Settings > Payments, and enable the “Allinpay INTL” payment method.
  • Configure the required settings for the payment gateway, such as your Allinpay account credentials.
  • Save changes, and you’re ready to accept international payments with Allinpay.

Changelog:

1.0.0

  • Initial release.

FAQ:
Q: What type of payments are accepted by this plugin?
A: Allinpay INTL accepts both domestic and international payments.

Q: What are the cards types processed by this plugin?
A: Allinpay INTL processes Mastercard, VISA, Unionpay, Diners, AMEX and Unionpay. Allinpay also processes PayNow, Wechat Pay and more ewallets. Please drop your account setup request to: cs@allinpay.sg.

Q: How do I get the necessary API credentials for Allinpay?
A: Set up an Allinpay merchant account to obtain your API credentials. Please drop your request to: cs@allinpay.sg.

Support:
If you have any questions or require assistance, please contact cs@allinpay.sg.

Screenshots:

Screenshot 1: Payment method selection on the checkout page.
Screenshot 2: Configuration settings for the Allinpay INTL payment gateway.

License

This plugin is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by the Free Software Foundation, either version 2 of the License, or any later version.

This plugin is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the GNU General Public License for more details.

You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License along with this plugin. If not, see http://www.gnu.org/licenses/.
